text: Kirkia dewinteri is a small tree in the Kirkiaceae, endemic to the dry savanna of the Kaokoveld in Namibia. This rare species is found on rocky outcrops, usually growing into a tall tree. Bark is yellow with blackish spots. Fruit a small woody capsule splitting into four valves. ==References== Category:Sapindales Category:Endemic flora of Namibia Category:Trees of Africa Category:Least concern plants Category:Least concern biota of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Kirkia dewinteri
